TypeSignature.Value: public class Frame : System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl, System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild, System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
.class public auto ansi Frame extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild, class System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
Public Class Frame Inherits ContentControl Implements IAddChild, IUriContext
public ref class Frame : System::Windows::Controls::ContentControl, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild, System::Windows::Markup::IUriContext
type Frame = class inherit ContentControl interface IAddChild interface IUriContext

summary.span: 畫面格是支援巡覽的內容控制項。

span.span: Frame is a content control that supports navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是內容控制項可讓您瀏覽至並顯示內容。 is a content control that provides the ability to navigate to and display content. 可以裝載在其他內容中，與其他控制項和項目。 can be hosted within other content, as with other controls and elements. > [!CAUTION] > 當控制項巡覽至 HTML 內容控制項在內部具現化原生 WebBrowser ActiveX 控制項。When the control navigates to HTML content, the control internally instantiates the native WebBrowser ActiveX control. WPF 會啟用安全性功能，藉由套用功能控制項的 WebBrowser ActiveX 控制項。WPF enables security features by applying feature controls to the WebBrowser ActiveX control. 會套用功能控制項不同 Xbap 和獨立的應用程式。The feature controls that are applied differ for XBAPs and stand-alone applications. 有些應用程式應該套用額外的功能控制項，以防止執行惡意內容。Some applications should apply additional feature controls to prevent malicious content from running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 WebBrowser 控制項和功能控制項 」 一節[安全性 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md)並[WebBrowser 控制項概觀與教學課程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=179388)。For more information, see the "WebBrowser Control and Feature Controls" section in [Security (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md) and [WebBrowser Control Overviews and Tutorials](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=179388). 內容可以是任何類型的.NET Framework 物件和 HTML 檔案。Content can be any type of .NET Framework object and HTML files. 一般情況下，不過，頁面是慣用的方式瀏覽的套件內容 (請參閱)。In general, however, pages are the preferred the way to package content for navigation (see ). 內容可以瀏覽至藉由設定屬性與所需內容的 URI。Content can be navigated to by setting the property with the URI for the desired content. 此外，內容可以瀏覽至使用其中一個的下列多載方法：Additionally, content can be navigated to by using one of the following overloads of the method: - - 當內容巡覽至的 URI，傳回的物件，包含的內容。When content is navigated to by URI, returns an object that contains the content. 或者，內容可以瀏覽至使用其中一種接受物件的方法多載：Alternatively, content can be navigated to by using one of the method overloads that accepts an object: - - 瀏覽的存留期可以追蹤透過下列事件：The lifetime of a navigation can be tracked through the following events: - - - - - - - 發生巡覽; 每次引發並不是所有的事件所引發的事件集的取決類型 （內容或內容片段），就會發生的瀏覽和巡覽完成的方式 （已取消、 已停止或失敗）。Not all events are raised each time that a navigation occurs; the set of events that are raised is determined by the type of navigation that occurs (content or content fragment) and how the navigation completes (canceled, stopped, or failed). 下圖說明在其中將會引發這些事件的順序：The following figure illustrates the sequence in which these events will fire: ![頁面巡覽流程圖](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "頁面巡覽流程圖")![Page navigation flow chart](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "Page navigation flow chart") 期間或之後的瀏覽提供之內容所要巡覽，包括正在巡覽之內容的 URI 的相關資訊 ()，目前內容的 URI ()，和包含的物件若要巡覽的內容 ()。During or after a navigation, provides information about the content that is being navigated to, including the URI of the content being navigated to (), the URI of the current content (), and an object that contains the content that was navigated to (). 當內容巡覽巡覽記錄中記錄的導覽中的項目。When content is navigated to, records the navigation as an entry in navigation history. 項目會加入向後巡覽記錄，其中一個新的瀏覽發生時，藉由呼叫方法，或瀏覽至向前巡覽記錄中的項目，藉由呼叫。An entry is added to back navigation history when either a new navigation occurs, by calling the method, or by navigating to an entry in forward navigation history, by calling . 項目就會加入向前巡覽記錄中，瀏覽至項目後巡覽記錄，藉由呼叫。An entry is added to forward navigation history by navigating to an entry in back navigation history, by calling . 和報表是否有項目後和向前巡覽記錄，分別。 and report whether there are entries in back and forward navigation history, respectively. 第一次，一段內容巡覽至另一段內容，從會自動顯示 巡覽 UI，可讓使用者向後巡覽和向前巡覽記錄。The first time that one piece of content is navigated to from another piece of content, automatically displays a navigation UI that allows users to navigate back and forward through navigation history. 您可以設定當巡覽 UI 會顯示藉由設定屬性。You can configure when the navigation UI is shown by setting the property. 根據預設，會使用它自己的巡覽記錄，只有當父導覽工具 (， ) 具有自己的巡覽歷程記錄找不到。By default, will use its own navigation history only if a parent navigator (, ) with its own navigation history cannot be found. 這表示框架的巡覽歷程記錄項目 mingled 與瀏覽歷程記錄項目之父巡覽器。This means that navigation history entries for the frame are mingled with navigation history entries for the parent navigator. 若要指定管理它自己的巡覽記錄，設定屬性設。To specify that a manages its own navigation history, set the property to . 最新項目後會移除巡覽歷程記錄，請呼叫。The most recent entry in back navigation history can be removed by calling . 不會儲存在巡覽記錄中的內容物件的執行個體。 does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history. 相反地，巡覽至使用巡覽記錄每次會建立內容物件的新執行個體。Instead, creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history. 此行為被設計來巡覽大量內容時，避免過多的記憶體耗用量。This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to. 因此，內容的狀態並不會記住從一個瀏覽至下一步。Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next. 不過，WPF 提供數種技術，供您可以巡覽記錄中儲存一段內容的狀態。However, WPF provides several techniques by which you can store a state for a piece of content in navigation history. 使用，您也可以記住多組的單一頁面的執行個體的狀態。Using , you can also remember multiple sets of state for a single page instance. ## 自訂 Frame 控制項Customizing the Frame Control 若要將相同的屬性設定套用至多個控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設，讓控制項的獨特的外觀。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱 < [ 透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和狀態所特有，請參閱 < [Frame 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/frame-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Frame Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/frame-styles-and-templates.md). 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只能影響該屬性是否都存在於控制項的預設範本，並設定使用。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺化屬性清單中的 「 變更視覺結構的控制項 」 一節[透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立簡單控制項，並指定要從 URI，使用載入的初始來源內容屬性。The following example shows how to create a simple control and specify initial source content to load from a URI using the property. [!code-xaml[FrameSnippets#SetFrameSourceXAML1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameSnippets/CS/MainWindow.xaml#setframesourcexaml1)] [!code-xaml[FrameSnippets#SetFrameSourceXAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameSnippets/CS/MainWindow.xaml#setframesourcexaml2)] [!code-xaml[FrameSnippets#SetFrameSourceXAML3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameSnippets/CS/MainWindow.xaml#setframesourcexaml3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Navigation::JournalOwnership JournalOwnership { System::Windows::Navigation::JournalOwnership get(); void set(System::Windows::Navigation::JournalOwnership value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 是否要負責管理自己的巡覽記錄，或是要將巡覽記錄管理工作讓與父代巡覽器 (、)。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a is responsible for managing its own navigation history, or yields navigation history management to a parent navigator (, ).

value.span: 指定 是否要管理自己日誌的 值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether manages its own journal.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，會使用它自己的巡覽記錄，只有當父巡覽裝載 (， ) 找不到具有其本身的日誌 (例如，如果裝載於所裝載的內容中)。By default, will use its own navigation history only if a parent navigation host (, ) with its own journal cannot be found (for example, if a is hosted in content that is hosted by a ). 若要強制若要管理自己的巡覽歷程記錄，設定至。To force to manage its own navigation history, set to . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例說明，設定為使用自己的巡覽歷程記錄。The following example illustrates a that is configured to use its own navigation history. [!code-xaml[FrameJournalOwnershipSnippetSample#SetJournalOwnershipProperty](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameJournalOwnershipSnippetSample/CS/HomePage.xaml#setjournalownershipproperty)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用支援巡覽裝載的內容。 uses to support navigation for hosted content. 適用於裝載的程式碼以取得參考。 is useful for code that hosts a to get a reference to the . 所裝載的內容，這類，應該使用或是以取得參考。Content that is hosted by a , such as , should use or to get a reference to the . > [!NOTE] > 不會傳回相同的參考與呼叫並傳遞沒有。 does not return a reference to the same as calling and passing does. 前者會傳回所擁有雖然後者傳回瀏覽主機所在的內容瀏覽裝載。The former returns the that is owned by the while the latter returns the for the navigation host that navigated to the content in which the is hosted. 下列程式碼示範這些差異。The following code demonstrates the differences. [!code-csharp[NSGNSvsFNSSnippets#NSFrameDiffCODE1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGNSvsFNSSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#nsframediffcode1)] [!code-vb[NSGNSvsFNSSnippets#NSFrameDiffCODE1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGNSvsFNSSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#nsframediffcode1)] [!code-csharp[NSGNSvsFNSSnippets#NSFrameDiffCODE2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGNSvsFNSSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#nsframediffcode2)] [!code-vb[NSGNSvsFNSSnippets#NSFrameDiffCODE2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGNSvsFNSSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#nsframediffcode2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Navigation::NavigationUIVisibility NavigationUIVisibility { System::Windows::Navigation::NavigationUIVisibility get(); void set(System::Windows::Navigation::NavigationUIVisibility value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 可以顯示其瀏覽 UI 的時機。

span.span: Gets or sets when the can show its navigation UI.

value.span: A值，指定當可以顯示其巡覽 UI。

span.span: A value that specifies when the can show its navigation UI.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，第一個項目加入至巡覽記錄時，就會自動顯示其巡覽 UI。By default, a shows its navigation UI automatically when the first entry is added to navigation history. 巡覽 UI 之後會保持可見，並且包含 上一頁 或 向前巡覽按鈕會適時啟用或停用，以反映的項目數後及向前巡覽記錄項目。The navigation UI subsequently remains visible, with the back or forward navigation buttons becoming appropriately enabled or disabled to reflect the number of entries in back and forward navigation history. 您可以確保瀏覽的 UI 一律顯示設定：You can ensure that navigation UI is always visible by setting: 1. 至 to 2. 至 to 您設定至如果您想要隱藏巡覽 UI。You set to if you want to hide the navigation UI. 當巡覽 UI 就毫無意義，以您要從顯示的內容時，這可能是大小寫，或因為您要提供您自己的巡覽 UI。This might be the case when navigation UI doesn’t make sense with the content you are displaying from a , or because you are providing your own navigation UI. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何確定的瀏覽 chrome一律會顯示藉由設定至。The following example demonstrates how to make sure the navigation chrome of a is always visible by setting to . [!code-csharp[FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets#SetNavigationUIVisibility](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#setnavigationuivisibility)] [!code-vb[FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets#SetNavigationUIVisibility](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#setnavigationuivisibility)] [!code-xaml[FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets#SetNavigationUIVisibility](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets/XAML/Window1.xaml#setnavigationuivisibility)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SandboxExternalContent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.SandboxExternalContent : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 是否要在部分信任安全性沙箱 (已設定預設 使用權限) 中，將外部 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 內容隔離。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a isolates external [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] content within a partial trust security sandbox (with the default permission set).

value.span: 如果要在部分信任安全性沙箱中將內容隔離，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if content is isolated within a partial trust security sandbox; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 外部內容[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]不會包含應用程式的資源檔或內容檔案的內容 (請參閱 < [WPF 應用程式資源、 內容和資料檔案](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md))。External content is [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] content that is not included with an application as either a resource file or a content file (see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)). 當是`true`，和內容的來源是外部[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]檔案，將內容載入至預設值僅限於在部分信任安全性沙箱`Internet`權限集合。When is `true`, and the source for the content of the is an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file, the content is loaded into a partial trust security sandbox that is limited to the default `Internet` permission set. 外部內容會接著載入不同的處理序。The external content is subsequently loaded into a separate process. 如此一來，外部內容隔離，而且也沒有存取應用程式範圍的資源，例如資源字典 (請參閱)。As a result, the external content becomes isolated and does not have access to application-scope resources, such as resource dictionaries (see ). > [!NOTE] > 只會包含外部內容時屬性設定為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]外部[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]檔案。 will only contain external content when the property is set to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file. 使用提供的內容屬性會被視為內部的內容，以及接下來，是未隔離。 content that is provided using the property is considered internal content and, subsequently, is not isolated. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

exception.span: 當應用程式在部分信任中執行時，就會設定 。

span.span: is set when an application is executing in partial trust.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
